website_summaries.verdict: Comfort Fit produces a super-affordable, but effective, back stretcher with 3 different arch settings. Provides relief in as little as 5 minutes a day.
pros: Can be attached to chairs for lumbar support
cons: Some reports of aggravated back injuries

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: 20+ yrs of back pain & chiropractors and this solves my back pain. You have to use it every day and some days it hurts like hell, but keep it up. Improved my posture too. Make it part of your daily routine and you will see a definitive difference in both your back and stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The first use, you find out how tight your spine is and day after day you will feel yourself move closer to the floor as you stretch legs out and arms overhead. I have been in a sciatica type of pain for years with no help but after a few weeks using this stretching devise, I am beginning to feel a bit less pain each week of stretching. I usually do a decent ab workout after I use this to stretch my spine and related muscles. I believe now that sciatic pain comes from years of declining correct posture. Now I am combating the urge to stand and move with poor posture after this devise has taught me how.
customer_reviews.author: DSDS

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A little about me... 42 yrs old. 10yrs in factories, 6 yrs military, 2yrs diesel mechanic, 7yrs automotive mechanic and just recently 2 months produce farming... this thing is a godsend! Brings my back back to new with a couple minutes a day couple of days a week
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: It works for me. I have degenerative spinal disease ...
customer_reviews.text: It works for me. I have degenerative spinal disease and have had physical therapy for it. I learned about this type or treatment in the physical therapy. Can't say it will work for anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Notadev

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this because I tend to get back pain from sitting down all day. I use this in my office chair. At first, it felt weird but has definitely helped with the lower back pain I get from bad posture. It tends to help mainly because it forcibly corrects my posture. My back also feels better after long days in the office and it has just been a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT FIT BACK LUMBAR
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. It really helps his back. It doesn't benefit me as much. I think it's because it's longer than I need. But it does do the job it is made for.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Romero

customer_reviews.title: Save money don’t go to the chiropractor by one of these
customer_reviews.text: This is better than going to the chiropractor great product for the money I use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kaye

customer_reviews.title: It's not comfortable to begin with
customer_reviews.text: This product is what I was looking for. It's not comfortable to begin with, but it sure helps me out. It's not expensive and there are no electrical parts to break. Plus it breaks down so that you can travel with it in your suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: George Chekouras

customer_reviews.title: Does what it purports to do
customer_reviews.text: After a stressful move I was walking like a cripple. Two sessions laying on this and I was SO MUCH BETTER. I don't really need it so much now, so I strapped it to my work chair and it keeps me flexible. The little bumps along the side are very helpful, they hurt a little but this little thing is like magic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Custo

customer_reviews.title: but in this case it just doesn't feel like it does anything a simple foam lumbar roll does
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected. I normally give things that work as expected 5 stars, but in this case it just doesn't feel like it does anything a simple foam lumbar roll does. But it feels exactly like it looks it would and it does stretch your back. Solid value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The board is a little too small for the back. The material of the board is very hard and not comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Use it right and it will slowly change your back
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece of equipment, don’t rush take your time starting at the beginning and feel out the product slowly to understand the right placements for your back, anything wrong can do harm
customer_reviews.author: Itz TK

customer_reviews.title: Real Results
customer_reviews.text: As an healthcare practitioner bending over the table of clients all day , and having an injury of my ribs on one side , I couldn't bend or crack my back the way I used to. After using the lumbar stretcher just three times , my back is freed up and flexible again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thal

customer_reviews.title: It broke just 9 days after return deadline!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic pieces broke off 9 days after return deadline! They cracked off while my husband was using it & he weighs 170 pounds. Not exactly an overweight situation! Very disappointed & I can't even return it! Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: I have not used it that much
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it, it seems to be working ok. It was difficult to get it assembled, but I am not all that strong these days.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: not very comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: you have to use it on the floor with a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: june h.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This actually hurts to lie on, plus it broke after three months.
customer_reviews.author: MQUINCY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful that this would atleast do something for back pain. It did not.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my clients and husband. I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: Really helps my clients and husband. I am a massage therapist who gives instruction to stretch at the beginning and ending to every day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bennatt

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest but not horrible
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Isnt very confortable and its hard to use it for more then 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Dane Hoegh

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is so hard that it is very hard to bend
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: It does help me some
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I get relief while Im using it, Ive only had this a week. Hoping it will help long term with regular use. I had a hard time adjusting the levels, pinched my hands several times. Its exactly what you expect for the money you're spending.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ward

customer_reviews.title: It works with my low back pain.
customer_reviews.text: The top board is very sturdy and with good quality. But you need work hard to make it bent. Overall, this product is good and works with my low back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mac-Fix Store

customer_reviews.title: I use nightly
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for lower back and neck pain!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Cost-effective & it works
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, cost-effective, and works for its intended use! Would buy again....no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have spinal stenosis and chronic pain. So far it seems to help most days.
customer_reviews.author: GKN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product and have been using for two days. Product appears to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick H.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Being using it for the past two weeks, good quality product
customer_reviews.author: Neev

customer_reviews.title: Car Accident
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, he was hit by a car a couple of years ago (he was a pedestrian), it broke his hip. During his recovery he developed a limp that eventually caused his spine to curve and he would experience tightness in his back and would beg me to pop it but I wasn't sure it was safe. I purchased this to help alleviate some of that pain, it worked to a certain extent. The only reason I chose this instead of a chiropractor is because I wanted to wait until he was done rehabilitating his leg and walking normal, otherwise he would continue to walk in a way that would cause the spine to curve again.
customer_reviews.author: MaternalUnit

customer_reviews.title: I love it and would recommend this for anyone that has ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big reviewer, but I tried this yesterday and it popped my back in about three different places and the pain and stiffness I had been feeling for a long time was instantly gone. I have less pain in my hips and legs, too. My back is a little sore (probably because it does contort your back to adjust your spine) and I am sure it will go away after continued use. I love it and would recommend this for anyone that has chronic back and lower extremity pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P

customer_reviews.title: Need to be careful
customer_reviews.text: Had to knock off a star for the hard pointed spikes. Really hurt. I decided to lay the extra blue foam strip on top of the other blue strip and it got me high enough to take some of the pressure of the hard spikes and made it bearable. You need to be careful how you lay on it and get up or it can be a pain.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I ended up buying a second to travel with! I use it nightly to get a good stretch before sleeping. My back pain is significantly less!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good back relief
customer_reviews.text: A nice way to stretch your back out and get some relief.
customer_reviews.author: The C

customer_reviews.title: I was having issues with a disk in my mid-lower ...
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with a disk in my mid-lower back, and this worked wonders! Some people wrote complaints regarding the reflexology spikes but they did not bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenner Lynn

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My lower back sometimes hurts (probably from my poor posture), and usually I feel better after laying on a lumbar pillow. I got this to see if the different levels do anything. I still get the same relief with this, which is good. I recommend not leaving it on the 2nd or 3rd slot though - the plastic gets used to being there and it's hard to put it back down to the 1st level. The 'spikes' don't hurt unless you hit it from an angle. I usually just lay down flat with this.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella West

customer_reviews.title: Good for hypokyphosis
customer_reviews.text: My back curves the wrong way and hurts, so I use this to help relieve pain. I use it for about 5 min a day and it helps bring relief. Not super easy to adjust to different levels. The extra cushion is a nice feature
customer_reviews.author: C Delfs

customer_reviews.title: Happy back, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: Happy back, happy life! Does the work. I do ot for 5 min a day and reduces the pain from the lower back. Happy with the product. Good job Comfort Fit!
customer_reviews.author: R. Romero

customer_reviews.title: The ones without it are not as good.
customer_reviews.text: The trigger points are crucial. The ones without it are not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I had it for about 9 months before the end snapped off.
customer_reviews.text: I literally only used this as a lumbar support in a chair, so not even putting my full weight on it. Within 9 months, the end of snapped off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gudim

customer_reviews.title: Helped my back for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Helped stretch my lower back out. Felt it working and it was great. The hard nubs are a little painful but it doesnt bother me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Back pain goes away
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great design. Sturdy and relatively comfortable, it provides great relief from back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for your back
customer_reviews.text: Love it.....its 3 range of motions is awesome. Great for traceling too! Use it everyday! Back feels wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: sandy l anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stretches slowly and opens spine.
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday to stretch and loosen my spine after standing all day at work. Grateful I found this. [2] Now after using it for a year, still works wonderfully. I use everyday, loosens vertebrae and releases pressure.
customer_reviews.author: James Handlan

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I like this, it stretches my back and gives relief.. works for me, if you don’t like the acupuncture bumps flip it over....
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really helps
customer_reviews.text: I use it at night. It really helps lessen my back pain during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy_Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Helps alot
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! Lay on it and my back sounds like rice krispies .. helped with stretching my back.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: ... this for myself but my husband has fallen in love with it as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself but my husband has fallen in love with it as well, we use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: I received and tried it, but it is not working to me. I dont recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JasonJ

customer_reviews.title: You need to be strong to be able to set this up.
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to bend the main piece into place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Its good just has how I expected it to be
customer_reviews.author: Cannie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it just know the trick how to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My mother has a bad back so I got her this as a random present and she loves it. Very easy setup, mom loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Fix yourr back.
customer_reviews.text: Works better then expected, does not hurt back as some people have complained about. I can deadlift at gym come home stretch and be able to walk normal without I have to stay in bed for two days. Only level 2 is useful for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brobertd

customer_reviews.title: Stay straight!
customer_reviews.text: As we get older our spinal column tends to curve. I hope this helps prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz Anzivino

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little painful when placed on the floor but it keeps me from falling sleep inside the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: looking for a device to stretch you back........look no more!!!!
customer_reviews.text: the device is extremely easy to assemble, you do have to make some effort to set it up, the first position wish is the easiest to set up will make no effect on you, the second and third will, i will highly recommend to use any device to warm the muscles of your back first to loose them up before using this device, the blue part is a soft foam, similar to the one's you see in yoga mattress ,the whole thing is plastic, but hard plastic, no worries, the spike are not uncomfortable........i hope you find this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: IZULA

customer_reviews.title: I give this product no star
customer_reviews.text: If there was a no star option I would have chosen it. I ordered this item based on all the great reviews. Well, I wish I had stayed away from it. I followed the instructions, was careful, used the lowest setting and didn't stay on it to long. I have since had chronic pain in my back, a pain that I had never felt before. I saw the chiropractor several times but no relief. I can only hope that this is not permanent and will in time get better. To all my fellow back pain sufferers;; please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella D. Hensley

product_meta.title: Comfort Fit Back Stretcher, 3 Level Stretching Device Lumbar Support Posture Corrector, Upper and Lower Back Pain Relief with Soothing Acupressure
product_meta.description:
A SIMPLE WAY TO STRETCH YOUR BACK IMPROVE POSTURE ENHANCE FLEXIBILITY 



restore the natural curvature of the back and improve flexibility in shoulder and back muscles. 



3 DIFFERENT LEVEL SETTINGS



 the Comfort Fit lumbar support features 3 different settings to fully stretch and relieve pain in the lower back. Simply use for 5 minutes, twice a day for optimum results.



COMPACT DESIGN & PORTABLE - TRAVEL FRIENDLY



 take your lumbar stretcher with you on the go. Disassembles for maximum portability, will fit easily in bags and travel luggage 



PREVENTIVE CARE DEVICE FOR YOUR SPINE

 not only is the Comfort Fit lumbar support an excellent option for those suffering injury and soreness, it is also a great preventive care device for your healthy spine. 

For best results, use up to 5 minutes, twice a day to stretch the back muscles, and restore the natural curvature of the spine. 



LIMITED LIFETIME REPLACEMENT ON COMFORT FIT BACK STRETCHERS Add to cart now and experience the Comfort Fit back stretcher today!
feature_bullets: A SIMPLE WAY TO STRETCH YOUR BACK IMPROVE POSTURE ENHANCE FLEXIBILITY restore the natural curvature of the back and improve flexibility in shoulder and back muscles.
3 DIFFERENT LEVEL SETTINGS the Comfort Fit lumbar support features 3 different settings to fully stretch and relieve pain in the lower back. Simply use for 5 minutes, twice a day for optimum results.
COMPACT DESIGN & PORTABLE - TRAVEL FRIENDLY take your lumbar stretcher with you on the go.

PREVENTIVE CARE DEVICE FOR YOUR SPINE not only is the Comfort Fit lumbar support an excellent option for those suffering injury and soreness, it is also a great preventive care device for your healthy spine. For best results, use up to 5 minutes, twice a day to stretch the back muscles, and restore the natural curvature of the spine
